subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets seek a second team to share their spring training facility in Port St. Lucie, Florida, because it would generate more revenue and ensure another team does not depart the region.
snippet: The Mets seek a second team to share their spring training facility in Port St. Lucie, Florida, because it would generate more revenue and ensure another team does not depart the region.
